title: Google launches a free “Workspace Essentials Starter” plan
content:
After deciding to end support for free legacy G Suite accounts last month, Google has now launched a new plan in Google Workspace called Essentials Starter edition. It’s a free plan that lets businesses use all Google productivity apps except Gmail. The Workspace Essentials Starter plan (via 9to5Google) is primarily aimed at businesses that already

The post Google launches a free “Workspace Essentials Starter” plan appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Workspace Essentials Starter plan is primarily aimed at businesses that already have their own email systems in place.
